metadata.notes: 98° Gruppo deployed from Belgium to North Africa Feb-Mar 1941 with 14 BR.20M aircraft. Based at Castel Benito (arrival) then Bir Dufan for night bombing operations. Suffered 15 aircraft losses (mostly mechanical failures from desert conditions) by April 1942. Unit returned to Italy April 1942. Quarter 1941-Q4 covers Operation Crusader period (Nov-Dec 1941). No squadriglia designations found in sources. Commander name unavailable in Tier 1/2 sources. Personnel estimates based on standard bomber gruppo establishment (4-5 crew per aircraft × 14 aircraft = ~60 aircrew, plus ~100 ground crew). Aircraft strength: 14 at deployment (Feb 1941), estimated 10 operational by Q4 1941 accounting for attrition.
